text: Sison can refer to: * Sison, Pangasinan, Philippines * Sison, Surigao del Norte, Philippines * Sison (plant), a genus of plants in the family Apiaceae * Jose Maria Sison, founder of the Communist Party of the Philippines in 1968 and the New People's Army guerrilla group in 1969 ==See also== * Sisson, a surname
title: Sison
